text: @Ewanpolitical @Jackson_Carlaw 'We should all be focused on defeating Coronavirus.' That's what the FM is doing, can you say that about Boris? Herd Immunity still seems to be the way his tactics are leading. England is suffering secondary spikes of infection, how do we control that without limiting the spread?
